
# ===== Android Studio / IntelliJ =====
.idea/
*.iml
*.ipr
*.iws

# ===== Gradle =====
.gradle/
build/
*/build/

# ===== Local configuration =====
local.properties

# ===== Log files =====
*.log

# ===== OS generated files =====
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# ===== APK / AAB =====
*.apk
*.aab

# ===== External native build =====
.cxx/

# ===== Keystore files (DO NOT COMMIT) =====
*.jks
*.keystore

# ===== Firebase / Google services =====
google-services.json
firebase.json

# ===== Kotlin =====
*.kotlin_module

# ===== NDK =====
obj/

# ===== Temporary files =====
*.swp
*~
